options.label: Dousan
options.description: The Dousan are a spiritual clan of nomads who decorate their bodies with tattoos and place great importance on acknowledging the passage of time and the inevitability of death. As such, they often dismiss other clans as materialistic and facetious. They see little point in unnecessary conversation, preferring silence and stillness.

options.label: Drenchen
options.description: The Drenchen clan are proud hunters, famed for their ability to breathe underwater and swim with the swiftness of a Ruswha, though the females of this clan cannot fly. With limited exposure to the other clans, the Drenchen have a reputation for being rude and uncultured, but the truth is a Drenchen values honesty and the truth before politeness.

options.label: Grottan
options.description: Very few Gelfling are aware of the Grottan's existence, believing that they were extinct. The Caves of Grot are a twisting network of tunnels, home to countless creatures and fungi. Recently the caves have been cursed by a terrible spreading blight known as the Darkening, forcing the clan to come to the surface and integrate with the surface-Gelfling.

options.label: Sifa
options.description: The Sifa are known for being as gregarious as they are mysterious. Though their home is in the villages across the coast of the Silver Sea, Sifas can be found all across Skarith as sailors, Mystics, and scoundrels. This has given them a reputation as untrustworthy, as many Sifas enjoy outwitting their slow-talking cousins.

options.label: Spriton
options.description: A populous and widespread clan, the Spriton pride themselves on agriculture and simple values. Their skill at crafting and taming animals is in  great demand across Skarith, allowing them to enjoy a powerful trading empire. They are quick to share. You can always rely on a Spriton to open their hearth and homes to travelers.

options.label: Stonewood
options.description: The Stonewood clan were commonly employed as guards at the Crystal Castle, but as soon as the evils of the Skeksis were revealed, they were among the first to rebel. No one can deny that the clan creates some of the most dedicated and fierce warriors in all of Thra. Stonewood Gelfling value bravery and action, despising duplicity in all its forms.

options.label: Vapra
options.description: The most prosperous of the clans, the Vapra are very proud of their cultural and intellectual pursuits. Most Vapra can read and many learn to smith metal, create art, or play music. This focus on the arts and their prized position during the Skeksis rule has led other clans to think of the Vapra as haughty and work-shy.

options.label: Drenchen - Drenchen Clan
options.description: You can breathe underwater, and tests related to the swamps are improved.

options.label: Drenchen - Healing Touch
options.description: Once a day, heal with a touch, rather than during rest (page 31). Vliyaya.

options.label: Drenchen - Ambush Hunter
options.description: Double any damage dealt against unwary foes.

options.label: Drenchen - Finwings
options.description: You can swim as fast as a Landstrider can run, which is pretty fast.

options.label: Dousan - Dousan Clan
options.description: You can always find water, and tests related to the desert are improved.

options.label: Dousan - Accept Death
options.description: When damaged, add +1 to your Fighting rolls.

options.label: Dousan - Trance
options.description: Once a day you can commune with Thra, gaining insight into the history of an item.

options.label: Dousan - Dream-etched Tattoos
options.description: You are protected from Vliyaya effects; rolls to resist them are improved.

options.label: Grottan - Grottan Clan
options.description: You can see perfectly in the dark, and tests related to caves are improved.

options.label: Grottan - Finger-Talk
options.description: You can tap on hard surfaces to send messages to anyone touching that surface.

options.label: Grottan - Alchemy
options.description: During a rest you can make herbs into potions to double their duration or effect.

options.label: Grottan - Shrouding
options.description: You can extinguish the light from one light source within a short distance. Vliyaya.

options.label: Sifa - Sifa Clan
options.description: You can foretell tomorrow's weather, and tests related to seafaring are improved.

options.label: Sifa - Prophetic Warning
options.description: Once per day allow a Gelfling to reroll a die they just rolled. Vliyaya.

options.label: Sifa - Signs and Symbols
options.description: Tests to decipher ancient writing are improved.

options.label: Sifa - Sailor
options.description: Travel by boat for you and your allies is free, as you make yourself useful.

options.label: Spriton - Spriton Clan
options.description: You can speak the Podling tongue, and tests related to plains are improved.

options.label: Spriton - Animal Tongue
options.description: You can make yourself understood by the animals of Thra. Vliyaya.

options.label: Spriton - Greenfingers
options.description: After harvesting an herb, it gains +1 uses.

options.label: Spriton - Careful Packing
options.description: You can carry one extra piece of gear (heavy or not) without any penalty.

options.label: Stonewood - Stonewood Clan
options.description: You start with a simple weapon (page 257), and tests related to forests are improved.

options.label: Stonewood - Living Weapons
options.description: Unarmed Fighting tests are not hindered.

options.label: Stonewood - Unparalleled fighter
options.description: When you draw in a fighting challenge, deal one damage to your enemy.

options.label: Stonewood - Fated Warrior
options.description: By concentrating for a minute, you sense any legendary gear nearby. Vliyaya.

options.label: Vapra - Vapra Clan
options.description: Tests related to Skeksis or mountains are improved.

options.label: Vapra - Wealth
options.description: Gain three gems. These have no use, but are highly prized by Gelfling traders.

options.label: Vapra - Metalworking
options.description: You can improve a metal item once per item, giving it +1 durability.

options.label: Vapra - Skilled Flyer
options.description: You fly higher and faster than others; tests related to flying are improved.

options.label: Climbing
options.description: is used to scale walls, catch ledges and second story work.

options.label: Athletics
options.description: is used when leaping long distances, swimming, and running fast.

options.label: Reflexes
options.description: are used when dodging attacks and reacting quickly to situations.

options.label: Wildsense
options.description: is used when calming wild animals, or working out their moods.

options.label: Handling
options.description: is used when keeping control of a mount or taming a creature.

options.label: Tracking
options.description: is used to follow creatures, even Gelfling, through the wilderness.

options.label: Finesse
options.description: is used when attacking in a dexterous way, good for swift opponents.

options.label: Marksmanship
options.description: is used when shooting or throwing a weapon.

options.label: Ferocity
options.description: is used to put all your force into attacks and use heavy weapons.

options.label: Ancients
options.description: is used when remembering old stories or read ancient runes.

options.label: Vliyaya
options.description: is used when trying to deremine the magical nature of a device.

options.label: Healing
options.description: is used when tending to your allies' wounds, and identifying maladies.

options.label: Fortitude
options.description: is used when enduring great strain, or resisting injury.

options.label: Strength
options.description: is used when trying to force doors, bend bars, or cut down trees.

options.label: Block
options.description: is used when shielding yourself or others from harm.

options.label: Sneaking
options.description: is used when trying to move unseen and unheard.

options.label: Awareness
options.description: is used when spotting small details, or hearing quiet sounds.

options.label: Skulduggery
options.description: is used when using sleight of hand, or operating machinery.

options.label: Charm
options.description: is used when getting others to see your point of view, or tell a fib.

options.label: Artistry
options.description: is used when dancing, playing music, or creating beautiful things.

options.label: Empathy
options.description: is used when trying to determine emotions or motivations.
